alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Graves (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 5:00PM EDT until August 26 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Calloway County in western Kentucky... Southern Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sedalia, or 9 miles south of Mayfield, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayfield, Lynnville, Sedalia, Wingo, Hazel, Water Valley, Dukedom, Harris Grove and Crossland. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 9 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
